entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
